rev.comment: This image use does not comply with [[WP:NFCC]] #10c and MUST be removed until it does. Thank you.
rev.diff:
Line 356: Line 356:
===Kidnappings and executions===
===Kidnappings and executions===
â
[[Image:JackHensley.PNG|thumb|left|[[Jack Hensley]], prior to his beheading]]
  â
[[File:Beheading japanese.jpg|thumb|left|[[Shosei Koda]], before his beheading]]
 
Along with bombings and hijackings, Islamic terrorists have made extensive use of highly-publicised kidnappings and executions, often circulating videos of the acts for use as propaganda. Notable [[Foreign hostages in Iraq|foreign victims]] include [[Nick Berg]], [[Daniel Pearl]], [[Paul Marshall Johnson, Jr.]], [[Foreign hostages in Iraq|Eugene Armstrong]], [[Jack Hensley]], [[Kim Sun-il]], [[Kenneth Bigley]], [[Shosei Koda]], [[Fabrizio Quattrocchi]], [[Margaret Hassan]]. One Iraqi victim was [[Seif Adnan Kanaan]]. The most frequent form of execution by these groups has been decapitation. While some targets are military, or seen as supporting the anti-Islamist forces, victims are also as varied as the Red Cross,<ref>[http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/middle_east/6187357.stm BBC NEWS | World | Middle East | Plea to release Iraqi aid workers<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> the Iraqi education ministry,<ref>[http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/middle_east/6153316.stm BBC NEWS | World | Middle East | Iraq ministry hostages 'tortured'<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> and diplomats.<ref>[http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/middle_east/4724323.stm BBC NEWS | World | Middle East | Press fury at killing of Algerians<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
Along with bombings and hijackings, Islamic terrorists have made extensive use of highly-publicised kidnappings and executions, often circulating videos of the acts for use as propaganda. Notable [[Foreign hostages in Iraq|foreign victims]] include [[Nick Berg]], [[Daniel Pearl]], [[Paul Marshall Johnson, Jr.]], [[Foreign hostages in Iraq|Eugene Armstrong]], [[Jack Hensley]], [[Kim Sun-il]], [[Kenneth Bigley]], [[Shosei Koda]], [[Fabrizio Quattrocchi]], [[Margaret Hassan]]. One Iraqi victim was [[Seif Adnan Kanaan]]. The most frequent form of execution by these groups has been decapitation. While some targets are military, or seen as supporting the anti-Islamist forces, victims are also as varied as the Red Cross,<ref>[http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/middle_east/6187357.stm BBC NEWS | World | Middle East | Plea to release Iraqi aid workers<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> the Iraqi education ministry,<ref>[http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/middle_east/6153316.stm BBC NEWS | World | Middle East | Iraq ministry hostages 'tortured'<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> and diplomats.<ref>[http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/middle_east/4724323.stm BBC NEWS | World | Middle East | Press fury at killing of Algerians<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
